vote.title: To appoint Alana Shockey, Deputy Director, Columbus Department of Public Utilities, 910 Dublin Road, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Mid-Ohio Regional Planning Commission, to represent the City of Columbus' interests, in her official capacity, until such time as the appointment is rescinded or she resigns (profile attached).
vote.description:
Title
Â 
To appoint Alana Shockey, Deputy Director, Columbus Department of Public Utilities, 910 Dublin Road, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Mid-Ohio Regional Planning Commission, to represent the City of Columbus' interests, in her official capacity, until such time as the appointment is rescinded or she resigns (profile attached).
